page.title: 10EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: Over half the schools in our area have their own{swimming pool}and all but 3 have an active{Parent-Teacher {Association.}Most participate in some kind of volluntary service in and about the town. They all take part in {local sports and music festivals.}The senior and 1 special school have{mini {buses.}Three schools have an{orchestra and over half offer{music tuition, mostly in woodwind and strings. {34%}of secondary school pupils go on to the{6th Form College}to take{A {Levels.}The Independent schools also offer A Level courses.{Modern {Languages}are taught at all senior schools but only the{private schools have{Latin and Greek.}Of{57 computers in use, the ratio is{1:22}in the private sector and{1:84}in the state.{Scholarships}are offered by the {private sector for bright students.
